verbs.description: [ARG0: Michael Cohen] [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: received] [ARG1: a secret payment of at least $ 400,000] [ARGM-PNC: to arrange talks between the Ukrainian president and Trump] .
[ARG0: Michael Cohen] reportedly received a secret payment of at least $ 400,000 to [V: arrange] [ARG1: talks between the Ukrainian president and Trump] .
